attribute.name: domain
attribute.expr: eval: " self.id IN (SELECT am.paymentMode FROM AccountManagement am WHERE am.company = :company) "

attribute.name: title
attribute.if: eval: (!company?.accountConfig?.accountingDaybook || !journal?.allowAccountingDaybook) || (statusSelect == MoveRepository.STATUS_NEW || statusSelect == MoveRepository.STATUS_SIMULATED || statusSelect == MoveRepository.STATUS_DAYBOOK)

attribute.name: title
attribute.if: eval: company?.accountConfig?.accountingDaybook && journal?.allowAccountingDaybook && (statusSelect == MoveRepository.STATUS_NEW || statusSelect == MoveRepository.STATUS_SIMULATED)

action-view.name: action-move-view-period-moves-to-validate
action-view.title: Move list to validate
action-view.domain: self.period = :_id AND (self.statusSelect NOT IN (1,3,4) OR (self.statusSelect = 1 AND (self.archived = false OR self.archived is null) ))

filter.title: Current Period Entries
filter.domain: self.period IS NULL OR (CURRENT_DATE >= self.period.fromDate and CURRENT_DATE <= self.period.toDate)

filter.title: Moves to export
filter.domain: self.ignoreInAccountingOk = false AND self.journal.notExportOk = false AND self.accountingOk = false
